description.narrative: Individuals, households and communities in intervention areas have access to information and have appropriate knowledge on essential family practices for education , HIV/AIDS prevention and management, child survival and development and maternal health., which contributes to Corporate External Relations And Partnerships, Communication And Resource Mobilization, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. title.narrative: Individuals, households and communities in intervention areas have access to information and have appropriate knowledge onessential family practices for education , HIV/AIDS prevention and management, child survival and development and maternal health.

description.narrative: Communities have improved knowledge on essential family practices (EFP) and good practices. Progress was made in the adoption of EFP from 2012 to 2016 with increased rates of exclusive breastfeeding 12 per cent to 24 per cent and birth registration: 65 per cent to 71 per cent. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2017
